problem_statement: Small development teams and solo developers need application security expertise but can't afford enterprise consultancies or don't know where to start.
solution_statement: TamperTantrum Labs provides accessible application security consulting to solo devs and small teams without enterprise gatekeeping or intimidating processes.
mission_statement: Make application security accessible to solo devs and small teams without enterprise gatekeeping.

positioning.what_we_are: Approachable AppSec consulting for developers and small teams

competitive_landscape.competitive_advantage: Accessible, developer-friendly approach without enterprise overhead
